doc.title: Stringifier

value.content: An object's stringifier is any attribute or method that is defined to provide a textual representation of the object for use in situations where a string is expected.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Stringifiers in Information contained in a WebIDL file

doc.summary: An object's stringifier is any attribute or method that is defined to provide a textual representation of the object for use in situations where a string is expected.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
